Name: Anaconda3
Description: Software that can install the Python language, Python packages, and other research software. Learn more about using Anaconda at our [Anaconda on Cheaha page](software.md#anaconda-on-cheaha). You may be interested in our [OpenOnDemand Jupyter Notebook interactive app](../open_ondemand/ood_jupyter.md).

Name: CUDA, cuDNN
Description: Libraries for developing and using deep learning and AI models with NVidia GPUs. Commonly used with TensorFlow and PyTorch. See our [GPU page](../slurm/gpu.md) for more information.

Name: Mathematica
Description: Mathematical CAS and numerical computing software. Try our [Open OnDemand HPC Desktop interactive app](../open_ondemand/hpc_desktop.md).

Name: Matlab
Description: Matlab language and development environment. We recommend using our [Open OnDemand Matlab interactive app](../open_ondemand/ood_matlab.md).

Name: R, Rstudio
Description: R language and RStudio IDE. We recommend using our [Open OnDemand RStudio interactive app](../open_ondemand/ood_rstudio.md).

Name: SAS
Description: Statistical analysis software. Try our [Open OnDemand HPC Desktop interactive app](../open_ondemand/hpc_desktop.md).

Name: Singularity
Description: Software container engine. See our [Containers](../../workflow_solutions/getting_containers.md) page for more information.

Name: Stata
Description: Statistical analysis software. Try our [Open OnDemand HPC Desktop interactive app](../open_ondemand/hpc_desktop.md).
